Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: enhanced kanban card detail view (Phase 1 MVP)

Implements clickable kanban cards with comprehensive job detail modal and status-specific fields.

## Added Components
- JobDetailModal.vue - Main detail view with full job information
- Status-specific field components (6 total):
  - ToSubmitFields: CV/CL readiness + Apply button
  - WaitingForCallFields: Submission timestamp display
  - InterviewingFields: Phase tracker with progress bar
  - OfferFields: Salary input + benefits
  - NotNowFields: Retrospective reason + learnings
  - AcceptedFields: Congratulations UI + archive

## Updated Components
- ApplicationCard: Now clickable with visual affordances
  - Added click event emitter
  - Added hover effects and keyboard navigation
  - Stop propagation on delete to prevent unwanted clicks

## New Services
- kanban-api.ts: Complete API service for job operations
  - CRUD operations for jobs
  - RPC function wrappers for specialized updates
  - Interview phase tracking
  - Salary offer management
  - Retrospective capture

## Type Updates
- Updated Job interface with migration 014 fields:
  - Interview tracking (phase_total, phase_current, prep_suggestions)
  - Offer analysis (salary_amount, currency, benefits, ai_analysis)
  - Retrospective (reason, learnings)
  - Status history (analytics)
- Added new TaskType values for AI features (Phase 2)
- Added job_id to KanbanCard interface

## Features
- âœ… Clickable cards open detailed modal
- âœ… Full job details display (description, match analysis)
- âœ… Status switcher dropdown
- âœ… Status-specific fields render based on current status
- âœ… Edit/delete functionality
- âœ… Mobile responsive design
- âœ… Keyboard accessible (ESC to close, Enter/Space to open)
- âœ… API integration with Supabase
- âœ… Optimistic UI updates

## Phase 1 Scope
This commit includes the MVP without AI features:
- No interview prep AI (Phase 2)
- No salary analysis AI (Phase 2)
- No comments system (Phase 3)

## Related
- Migration 014 already exists (adds DB fields)
- Documentation: app/docs/features/kanban_job_tracker/kanban_card/
